description: A task management app that uses AI to prioritize tasks based on deadlines and importance.
An app to help users track their carbon footprint and suggest eco-friendly alternatives.
A fitness app that combines workout routines with meal planning for a holistic health approach.
An educational platform that connects learners with experts for one-on-one tutoring sessions.
An app to simplify event planning by managing guest lists, RSVPs, and vendor coordination.
